               FIELD=(29,'                             ',,54),         X
               FIELD=(29,'                             ',,83),         X
               FIELD=(29,'                             ',,112),        X
               FIELD=(29,'                             ',,141),        X
               FIELD=(29,'                             ',,170),        X
               FIELD=(29,'                             ',,199),        X
               FIELD=(29,'                             ',,228)
